job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Software Engineer - GPU Compute: Full-time/ Part-time/ Contract-to-HireQualificationsStrong knowledge of C++ and experience in large code basesStrong knowledge of CUDA as applied to recent GPU microarchitectures (e.g., Volta, Turing)BS in computer science or related fieldStrong knowledge of 3D geometry and linear algebraExperiencing debugging and optimizing GPU kernels using tools like nvprof and the Visual ProfilerComfortable in Linux development environments
